definition: Hungary/Hungarian/abbr. for 匈牙利[Xiong1 ya2 li4]
one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
to plan in advance (idiom)/a card up one's sleeve/forewarned is forearmed

sentences.english: Methods Multimedia technology was used in cardiothoracic surgical teaching.
sentences.chinese: 方法在胸心外科教学中使用多媒体教学方法。

sentences.english: And there dwell in this comely garden white peacocks and peacocks that have blue breasts.
sentences.chinese: 在这秀美无比的花园里住着白孔雀和蓝胸孔雀。

sentences.english: Her hands delighted in the thick hair that covered his chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的手在他浓厚的胸毛里欢快得很。

sentences.english: My chest tensed just thinking about it.
Rosy pipits seem to have broad and long supercilium in non-breeding plumage.
sentences.chinese: 粉红胸鹨似乎在非繁殖羽时有粗而长的眉线。

sentences.english: Larger muscle groups are thighs, back, and chest.
sentences.chinese: 大肌肉群在大腿，胸和背等部位。

sentences.english: Objective To find out the outcome of preventionchylothorax by prophylactic ligature thoracic duct in esophagealcacinoma procedure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结扎胸导管对防止术后乳糜胸的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To find out the outcome of preventionchylothorax by prophylactic ligature thoracic duct in esophagealcacinoma procedure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结扎胸导管对防止术后乳糜胸的效果。

sentences.english: How do you feel about a pushup bra?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得向上托的纹胸怎样？

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the pathogenesis of atelectasis after chest trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的对胸外伤后肺不张发生的原因进行探讨。

sentences.english: Thechestshould be broad, very deep and well let down between the forelegs.
sentences.chinese: 胸应该很宽，非常深，位于两前肢中间。

sentences.english: One of the shells landed on the breastwork of our shelter and did not explode.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一枚落在我们的庇护所的胸墙上。

sentences.english: Treasure in hand, and against his chest.
sentences.chinese: 手里拿着宝贝，贴着他的胸。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the clinical experience on treatment of thoracolumbar spinal fracture with reduction fixation system (RF system).
sentences.chinese: 目的总结RF系统手术治疗胸腰椎骨折的经验。

sentences.english: Conclusion Multimedia-aided teaching is an effective way to improve cardiothoracic surgical teaching.
sentences.chinese: 结论多媒体教学方法有助于提高胸心外科教学效果。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the effect of preoperative chemotherapy on invasive thymoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价术前化疗在进展期恶性胸腺瘤治疗中的作用。

definition: slender waist/fig. pretty woman/mortise and tenon joint on a coffin
pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
